scene_description_enriched: A young man in full armor kneels before a book placed on a wooden lectern. He wears a golden collar and a circlet on his head. Behind him, a rich red and gold curtain is drawn back, revealing a checkered floor. Below the kneeling figure, a coat of arms is displayed, featuring a helmet topped with a crown and elaborate mantling in red and grey. The scene is framed by a decorative border.
